product_name: Scarpa Mythos Pro GTX Hiking Boots - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women-specific Scarpa Mythos Pro GTX Hiking Boots are supportive, all-leather boots built to withstand rigorous trails, long days and heavy packs when you're backpacking. Durable 1-piece nubuck leather uppers have softer nubuck leather ankle collars for comfort; ergonomic V-flex upper design allows a wide range of ankle motion. GORE-TEX liners make these boots waterproof yet breathable, for comfort in a variety of conditions; nylon linings are highly breathable and wick moisture away. Biometric outsoles employ exclusive Vibram(R) outsoles and dual-density midsoles that map different densities of polyurethane into specific locations to improve cushioning. Full rubber rands protect the leather from sharp rocks on rugged trails. No-friction micro-pulley hardware lets you really dial in the fit when you're lacing up the boots. Memory foam inside the boots helps ensure an accurate fit. Closeout.
short_description: The women-specific Scarpa Mythos Pro GTX Hiking Boots are supportive, all-leather boots built to withstand rigorous trails, long days and heavy packs when you're backpacking.
